apple_vendor_description: This loving couple emoji on Apple devices features a man with a dark skin tone and a woman with a light skin tone, embracing with a large, vibrant red heart hovering between them. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and glossy finish make the heart appear plump and full of affection, while the couple's gentle posture conveys deep connection. It's a powerful symbol of love, partnership, and shared happiness, rendered with Apple's signature visual appeal.
